website_summaries.verdict: The Heritage backpack is a sleek, functional backpack with thoughtful details and chic color  combinations. It's a perfect day pack to carry clothing, your computer, or any day-to-day essentials.
pros: Internal media pocket with headphone port
cons: This bag is only water-resistant, not waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Brand New bag Came our Used !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag brand new and received these items Inside of the backpack, a pen and tissues. The tissues were from a foreign country. I don’t understand how this is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Mini backpack for my dog...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute backpack. I bought this for my one year old son, seeing that it was a mini backpack, but didn’t realize how mini it would be. I was so excited to get it only to be disappointed, and laugh, when I opened it. This backpack fits my dog. Definitely couldn’t fit my child or hold anything in it really. Will be returning. Wish that this gave a better description but I hope the picture helps any future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am overjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: "This is an excellent backpack clearly of a high production quality. It carries all of my supplies for school (a ton of books, papers, and folders, as well as some clothes) with some room to spare, without looking packed. It has ample space and functionality while still looking stylish and minimal. It doesn't have the excess of zippers, useless compartments, or the long adjustment straps that are hallmarks of "freshman" backpacks. Overall, it remains functional without looking dorky, and it comes at a fair price. I really don't know what else I could ask for in a backpack, and I am so glad that I bought it!" |the Teen Boy|
customer_reviews.author: L. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Teeny tiny, like for the size of a doll - had to pay $6 to return!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize when I ordered this that they even made Herschel backpacks this tiny - for $19 I assumed it would be a little kids backpack - especially because it says "Kids backpack" in the description. It should say "Doll Backpack." They charged me $5.99 to return it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Erinboarder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it. Just don’t.
customer_reviews.text: An iPad mini case? Doesn’t even fit an iPhone. But hey, it fits my 4lb chihuahua. Don’t buy this. Just don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Simsen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small for my child.
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY small. I know it for a child, but it would need to be a very small child. Great quality, just not the right size for us. Perhaps the description should include a photo of a child wearing the backpack for reference? We did an exchange for a larger backpack and we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Perez

customer_reviews.title: It's great and I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I actually think I received the wrong backpack? I think I got the "Pop Quiz Multipurpose" backpack in the same color that I ordered, but it looked close enough so I didn't bother exchanging it or anything. Anyways, I got this backpack back in 2014 and used it everyday for a solid 2 years. It's great and I would highly recommend it. Of course, eventually there were some holes in the bottom, but I guess that's to be expected after carrying around textbooks everyday for 2 years. Anyways, I took off a star because I got the wrong backpack, but it was still very high quality, so no complaints here :)

customer_reviews.title: NOT a backpack. Fits in palm of hand
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 2 stars because it does look like it says and it seems like it’s made well but it fits in the palm of my hand. This is NOT a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: RickaJane

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Backpack on Earth!!  (According to my teen age son...)
customer_reviews.text: For Amazon Prime Day my teenage son only wanted one thing and this was it. I guess this backpack must be the rage among kids his age or something so I pulled up a You Tube review and it seemed like a solid and minimalistic backpack that had a lot of style and practicality. Well it arrived today and I must say I was impressed with the way it looked! Especially the leather bottom which seems very sturdy. I could tell he was very happy to get it plus we saved $20 during Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check the size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Herschel Heritage Back-packs. One was 15" the this one was only 13". I did not notice there were different sizes for the backpacks. I paid more for this smaller backpack than the larger size as well. That was disappointing. I wish it had been an option to select a size to warn me there were different sizes to choose from. Quality wise the backpack is high quality, zippers don't catch, thick fabric, and a sturdy base. Just disappointed the size difference was not more obviously noted and that I payed more for a smaller backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack at a great price. Not to mention that it looks good too. Material is heavy duty so it can stand up to the elements. A versatile backpack as well that can be used in numerous circumstances and situations. My only thing is that the laptop sleeve on the inside doesn't provide much protection from other contents in the back as well as keeping it snug for when you move around a lot. Best advice is that you get an external laptop sleeve to go around your laptop and put it the laptop sleeve. Otherwise top marks for a backpack at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: I have had a Herschel backpack before but I hated the fact that the bottom would sag when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Herschel backpack before but I hated the fact that the bottom would sag when I had things in it. This one is leather bound at the bottom and the overall structure is more stiff, which I love. Keeps it's shape and looks nice even when carrying heavier objects! Great quality bag, and very stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lacks a lot of organizational pouches - but still very cool & comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed, but it's lacking in a lot of organization pouches that you'd typically find in a jansport or other backpack. Essentially you're getting a front pocket (which is tiny and sometimes hard to open), the main pocket, and the laptop pouch - nothing more. The straps and the padding on the back make it very comfortable to carry, but if you're a student who carries a lot of little things (pens, stapler, etc), this might not be the backpack for you. Was really hoping this would be better, the design is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Intentionally Deceptive. Many people complained, still selling.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. This is an intentional attempt to deceive buyers. The description says that it is 15.6" tall. This is only 5 inches tall. This was likely a toy for a doll, and does not fit anything remotely close to an iPad or iPad mini. It barely fits an iPHONE!!
customer_reviews.author: G Strait

customer_reviews.title: Build Quality is Incredibly Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to replace my Jansport as it feels a bit cheap with no padding, but this one on the other hand cost about the same price while having plenty of padding and stronger shoulder straps. The leather is very smooth and easy to clean with just a dampened rag. The backpack is also very spacious, enough to travel with things like camera gear, portable speakers, tablets, or a laptop with the built in laptop sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Soneeuhz

customer_reviews.title: So far a great fit and perfect size for commuting
customer_reviews.text: So far a great fit and perfect size for commuting. Use it while cycling and it is comfortable and not too bulky. The inside water bottle holder and "laptop sleeve" is nice for extra compartment. Hoping it holds up as I love the style and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: CMETZ

customer_reviews.title: It’s made for a doll
customer_reviews.text: This cannot fit an iPad! It’s the size of my hand! This was made for a doll. Pretty sure my cell phone couldn’t fit in it!
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Arey

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a relatively small backpack that seems well made. Although not real leather, it still looks good (no leather smell). The only drawback is the length of the straps, which are good for children and smaller adults. The straps works for me (barely) but for the price, design, looks and construction, can't really complain. No backpack "amenities" (e.g., water bottle holder or pen holders), only a hold for an electronic device headphone (which I will not use).
customer_reviews.author: being_and_time

customer_reviews.title: i feel like its more for branding
customer_reviews.text: herschel backpacks are always expensive; not sure if its quite worth the price. i feel like its more for branding. i got the grey and white polkadotted ones and ovrall the quality is very nice. although it is much smaller than i expected. my macbook fits very snug in it and i can only fit about 1-2 more 1inch binders in the backpack as any more would make it way too tight/bulgy and would not close. the laptop case is nice though. i would also appreciate a few more small pockets here and there but theres only the small one on the outside that you see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Herschel backpack. Nothing happened to the first one; I just wanted one in a different color. It's great because I'm able to carry my laptop to and from work without any problems and it's an attractive bag.
customer_reviews.author: Winship75

customer_reviews.title: You need this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived just as expected. The quality is great! I love the leather touches. I tote this with me when I went on a light hike and to and from work. The pouch inside to hold my laptop is perfect and I love how I can feed my headphone wire through for organization as well. I would recommended this backpack to anyone. The neutral color matches many of my outfits and there's a great amount of padding so that I don't feel any pressure on my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum0124

customer_reviews.title: Ok so, here's what everyone wants to know...
customer_reviews.text: The approximate size of the bag is 6-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-1/4". The straps are so short that really only a chihuahua could wear this as a backpack (not kidding). However, the bag is the perfect size for what I wanted to carry in it. And, after I cut the straps in 2 and sewed on some black elastic bands, I was able to wear it as an actual backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Whale Rider

customer_reviews.title: Coin bag
customer_reviews.text: Picture is deceiving for that price the bag should be bigger
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: It's a mid sized backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than the other Herschel backpack I own (hence mid-volume). I was afraid my 15" laptop wouldn't fit, but it did. I like the neutral colors, but there are not as many compartments as in their classic "full volume" backpacks, it doesn't seem as sturdy, and it's almost double the price, not sure why. I like that it's blue inside though and I'm keeping it for the looks. If I ever need more space or extra protection for my laptop, I'll go for their Co Pop Quiz line (the one I already own). Herschel can't be beat and that's why I give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted black, but this gray Polar was available at a significant discount. Love the design, which is very muted, and the shades, which are darker than appear on the website. Inside it is your usual Herschel backpack, somewhat smaller than the classic, but with an ample pocket for a tablet or laptop. There is plenty of room for a purse, change of clothes (no shoes) and your plastic bag of grooming supplies and meds for an overnight. Of course, it would be sufficient for your elementary school child's lunch box and books as well, as it was intended for! Tough fabric and zippers that should hold up well without being hard to zip. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Samm

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stylish backpack
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for high school and am super happy with it. It's able to hold a lot of stuff (binder, folder, notebooks, books, jacket, etc) while not appearing overly large. The front pocket is also great for holding my wallet and earbuds. I do wish it had a place to store pencils and other supplies, along with maybe an inner water bottle holder. Overall, it's a good looking, functional backpack that I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter was going to return because she decided she didn't like the color but I kept it for myself because I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless for a doll.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. Not even realistic for a small child. Should have read the dimensions better.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: Solidly constructed, beautiful colours
customer_reviews.text: The colours are gorgeous and the inside is extremely spacious. Lots of padding on the shoulder straps so very comfortable. . My son loves it and will be using it for school from tomorrow. Only nitpick is the front outside pocket is a touch too small but otherwise this is a keeper. We will see how it handles the rigours of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: A. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: When they say mini, they mean it. Little bigger than the palm of my hand. Well made. Don't know what I'm going to do with it.. but cute.
customer_reviews.author: jill williams

customer_reviews.title: Function meets comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and color of this backpack. I was amazed the difference in weight in comparison to my previous backpack. Same items felt much lighter and a more comfortable wear. The material is strong, maintaining overall shape throughout use. I rated 4 out of 5, due to not having a proper water bottle/cup pouch. A nice feature is the padded back making daily use much more bearable. The extra padding is also the back of the laptop compartment, protecting your electronics. Would purchase again and makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Might last for a year
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Definitely not bulletproof. After a little over a year of use, one of them now has broken zippers and numerous holes in the canvas. The other one has a couple of holes and several very worn areas that are holes in the making. If you want a fashionable backpack for just one school year, they will work for you. But don't expect much more than that. ******************************************************************************************************************************************************************* Herschel makes great backpacks, period. Fantastic quality, well made and seemingly bulletproof. Both my kids --one in junior high and one in high school, carry them and love them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Great design, color and quality. Great interior pockets and slip case for laptop protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item because I just wanted all black with no leather (which is shown on the page) but I still end up receiving a backpack with the leather on it. I don’t feel going through the processes and returning it back and reorder the exact one that I wanted. false advertising but I still love Herschel products!
customer_reviews.author: Cshellem

customer_reviews.title: The mini is pretty much a keychain.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny! They don’t mess around about MINI. it’s literally a keychain. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Just a simple backpack for a small MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact this backpack is. Just what I wanted. It’s a simple bag, but fits my needs. Opening is a bit small perhaps and zippers don’t zip/unzip seamlessly due to fabric that overlays them, but I suspect that will be easier as it is broken in. Very lightweight. Good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: California Ranch Life

customer_reviews.title: Tears Easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my brother and after a few months it had a few tears. He still has it today but it is practically unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Rajin Tulsiram

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work everyday (laptop and tools). Also, I have traveled with this backpack two times. This backpack still looks great and is not falling apart. At work this backpack as been in the rain, snow, etc... and the backpack still looks great. It is a little small but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While I love the simple and cool looking design of this bag
customer_reviews.text: Im a huge fan of Herschel and an owner of several Herschel bags. While I love the simple and cool looking design of this bag, also the leather on the bottom of the bag I have to say that the quality isn't as good as my other Herschel. The non-leather part of the bag has rough material and the inside isn't as good as well. The laptop packet is not padded, its more like a piece of cloth with an elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Herschel always works well .
customer_reviews.text: I adore this backpack and in this color (beige) . I was going for a beachy look, so it pairs well with either a sea turtle keychain or a seashell etc. I could see this being masculine in color too but I have a thing for sand 😬. Although it’s not like, light as sand, but I still LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Backpack I’ve ever Owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack!!! Met all expectations and then some. I use a backpack regularly to carry this for my son and I, but this backpack just looked really cool to use. I ended up buying a second camo Herschel backpack but one that was sized for my 5yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Buna

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & durable backpack for work
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I ordered a different color & ended up returning it & going with the black on black. I use this for work & it makes the stuff I carry feel much lighter than my old backpack. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nobari

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE BACKPACK DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: So the backpack itself is very nice, and amazing quality. It’s Herschel so it’s a great product. but the one in the picture description that is supposed to be sold, is not the one you receive..it’s doesn’t come with the chest strap or the other small details. I wish I known this before I ordered and re-ordered a replacement since I thought they made a mistake. I am very unhappy since I had to wait for shipping again, only to receive the wrong item again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality and Machine Washable
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack and it’s been through three semesters with me- so it’s seen a lot! After a year and a half and it still looks brand new. The secret is putting it in a front loading washer sealed in a pillowcase. Also, because of the light color, oxyclean spot treatment gel works wonders for any discoloration. 10/10-Highly recommend, great quality Herschel.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Herschel backpack. Our first child used a smaller model one for 3 years. Our second child used that same backpack for another 2 years. Finally, had to get a larger backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Oknarb

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Has a built in sleeve for laptops, but doesn't have a lot of compartments inside the backpack. There is only 2 zippers. One small one in the front for pens and small items and the big zip for books and notebooks, etc. There is no water bottle holder, which is a bit of a bummer. My backpack hasn't gotten dirty yet even though I got the pink one, except for the dirt marks I received when I purchased the product..Yes, I received a opened package with some stains over the backpack, so buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Lotsopop

customer_reviews.title: feels like it will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction - thick durable material, feels like it will last a lifetime. Print is not quite as bright/contrasty as pictured, but I prefer that - looks more camo than floral. Zippers are stiff and strong - lots of room in the bag and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Donderevo

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Herschel makes a great backpack and we have a few in our home. Has a few extra interior pockets that come in handy and the bags themselves survive heavy use over a long period of time. Good padding in the arms too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking a lunchbox to work; room for cologne/etc.
customer_reviews.text: Great little backpack. Unrelated, but I was thrilled that the leather matched my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and great bag
customer_reviews.text: I this bag for school and I love it! I'm 5' 5'' and it fits me perfectly. The material is super durable and feels better than some Jansport bags I've had in the past. It also fits everything I need for school very easily. I do wish it had more organizers and a water bottle holder. Neither the main compartment nor the pocket on the front have any organization (other than the computer elastic).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it over Jansport any day
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is made from very thick fabric, not only is it durable, it FEELS durable as well. I'd recommend it over Jansport any day. The "attachments" to the zipper to make it easier to pull doesn't stay on as well as I would like it to be. After moderate usage, it becomes loose and eventually start slipping out and falling off. This doesn't bother me enough to cost it 1 star, but it is something to note when buying
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is pretty true to the picture
customer_reviews.text: My tried and true Swiss brand backpack literally buckled under the weight of all my books. I decided to finally get a Herschel bag after years of browsing its catalog. This backpack is pretty true to the picture, and it a nice design where you get a splash of color with the red accents without it being too noticeable or over the top. The one thing I don't like about Herschel bags is that they don't have a bottle pouch on the sides, but that's really a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leano

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it 🥰💯
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece. She’s 13 and in middle school. Took a gamble on the pattern and to my surprise she absolutely loved it. She texted me immediately when it came in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Size as expected, great quality and love the grey and leather colour i bought.the interior with the red and white makes it easy to see inside and is stylish. just wish it had more organizers inside and the laptop sections was padded more on both sides but so far so good i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my son wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a college student! Enough room for the essentials! It is nice looking tooaa
customer_reviews.author: KSinger

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: Great bookbag, matched my Hershel duffel bag I already had. Perfect fit for the bag they don’t count as a carry-on for the airplane. Quality material and zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Brent M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Its a little smaller than i thought it would be but that’s actually perfect for me. Love the color too, in general its gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Phisentea

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is VERY stiff and the zippers do not glide easily at all. I bought this because I liked my daughter's so much but her zippers are brass and mine are nylon or something. I'm hoping it will soften and the zippers will ease up with use. It's not nearly as nice as my daughter's.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bag for college needs so far, water bottle holder inside is small :/
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking bag (I got black) and pretty comfortable. My only issue with the bag is the lack of pouches or places to put items, it's spacious but there is a lack of storage pockets. Also the water bottle holder inside the bag is small and cannot fit my standard water bottle. Will come back and add more to this review if anything negative occurs. Hope this helps anyone, we need more reviews on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Garrido

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: So far this back pack has lasted me an entire school year without looking warn at all. I do try to be gentle with it but it has served me well and hopefully will continue to. Every weekday for the past 9 months I've had this thing with me for 10 hours, walking and biking around campus with a laptop, large notebook, usually one or two medium books, and pouch full ow school supplies and the quality is defiantly apparent because it had not broke.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great color and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. It is his favorite brand of backpacks. Durable and great color. He gets sick of the color before the bag starts to look old or something goes wrong. Great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Azarcon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it! Uses it everyday for work. I do see some thread starting to appear, but it havnt been an issue. He has had this for over a year now and still looks and feels great. We even use it for travel, which again he loves.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It’s little.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little backpack. It fits my 10 year old daughter perfectly. We didn’t want to strap her down wit a full sized pack. That should happen in jr. High. This bag still fits her Crome book and essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Zeulner

customer_reviews.title: Cute for college
customer_reviews.text: My daughter searched for the perfect size backpack, didn't want a huge one to lug around. This one is perfect, holds her macbook with room for some books - she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pak

customer_reviews.title: Super small- size of a phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but not useable. It fits in your hand- about the size of a cell phone. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Open Because of Stiff Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is super stiff and where it covers the zippers it make it hard to open the backpack. Very frustrating. I returned the backpack before I ever used it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana 808

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag since I’ve received it I have been carrying it with me everywhere there’s no place I don’t take this too stylish and I love the color black and affordable I’ve always wanted one of these backpacks feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Herschel makes a superior back. You pay for what you get. I had previously bought a look-a-like that the strap broke the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Great school backpack for lower grades
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for my 1st grader - good quality zipper + straps! He loves the camo, the front pouch with pocket organizers, and the laptop sleeve in the main compartment (he keeps his library books there). Just wish there was a side pocket to hold his water bottle. Otherwise, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: T A Y L O R

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bag! I still use it to this day, and it looks brand new after I bought it two years ago, it's water resistant too.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a backpack for petite women!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mid volume backpack and I'm so grateful I did. I'm 5'3 and 110lbs so finding a backpack that doesn't look like its about to swallow me whole is very difficult. Its perfect because it fits my laptop, pencils, a few notebooks, and my makeup bag without looking too chunky. Perfect to take to class. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Jodry

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find
customer_reviews.text: These backpacks are very well made. Not only are they extremely sturdy but they look good. They are made of a durable but pretty canvas and the trim is a nice brown leather. I haven't seen a backpack like this, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack, made with quality material and very durable. I purchased it for my kindergartener and while it’s big now, I know he will have it for years. I love that it’s simple in style but very roomy and again, well-made. I will definitely purchase more Herschel products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Bajramovic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my 16 year old son. He's a junior in high school and is always looking stylish. When we were searching for backpacks, this one caught our eye immediately. We both loved the fact that it has two complimenting colors, versus a solid color. The quality of the material is superb. This backpack was a bit pricey, but overall, worth every penny. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bookbag for a few months now, and I must say it is the perfect bag for me. As a senior in college that prefers free pdfs to textbooks, this bag is great since its relatively small and portable. It is also much more stylish (in my opinion) than other bags I see around campus since it has a much more simplistic design.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: but I think that is because the material is so thick and sturdy. There is a wide pocket inside
customer_reviews.text: I also get many compliments on this backpack and take it on lots of weekend trips! The front pocket is a bit tight, but I think that is because the material is so thick and sturdy. There is a wide pocket inside, against the back, and a side pocket that fits your cell phone or 16 size water bottle. It's a really cute bag and the straps feel very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Aviel Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Herschel backpack and like the first one I got (the settlement) this one does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward, it's incredibly sturdy, spacey, and you can use it for 10+ years if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Huang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack. No matter how much stuff you cram ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack. No matter how much stuff you cram into it it will always look small and sleek. Laptop pocket is perfect for my 15" Macbook, and the backpack keeps everything well kept while still looking great. Absolutely would buy it again but its durability is unparalleled at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but TINY
customer_reviews.text: Heads up: this is TINY. Photo includes a standard magazine to show its size
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son for Christmas and he loves it. It's perfect for high school as it's not too big or small. It's very durable and looks good at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: V. Dessouky

customer_reviews.title: Although I would recommend that you should not put your back against a ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this backpack for more than a year and it's held up until now. Although I would recommend that you should not put your back against a brick wall or anything with the same texture since it might cause small tears in the leather at the bottom of the bag. The only hard part to maintain of this backpack is the leather really everything else you don't have to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous in person
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful it’s just too large for a little girl. For teenager or a woman it’s an excellent book bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nanie

customer_reviews.title: Hip Backpack for all Ages!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my 3rd grade son. It's a step up from anything he's had in the past and I suspect it will last him for the next few years. Secretly, my husband and I hoped our son didn't like the backpack so we could steal if from him. It's a perfect size for anything you'd need to put in it, and it looks modern.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in June 2017, and it still looks like its brand new. It has been through A LOT of abuse, following me through life in NYC. It is spacious, holds more than I ever though it could. Straps are comfortable and the color of the bag goes with almost anything. I give it an "indestructable / 10"
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kladke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for work and traveling! I filled it to the brim on a recent vacation and it was extremely durable. Also holds up well in heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Peyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for 6 years and it is still going strong. Herschel has by far the most durable backpacks. It's the perfect size for weekend trips, commuting in the city, and to use for school.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pisano

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for its quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not worth for its price. I just bought this for present but I won’t buy it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Is this a backpack for cats?!?  It’s 5 inches tall.
customer_reviews.text: Is this a backpack for cats?!? It’s 5 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: kristen leslie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied  :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for Christmas and it is still in perfect condition. I use it for work. To carry my lunch and water so I may not put as much weight on it so see if it hold up with heavy books.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite backpack I've ever owned. It feels very durable and sturdy and the bottom as well as the top hook are extra sturdy. The color is exactly what I expected and looks great. I'm a small lady and this backpack holds everything I need without sticking out too far. It has a pocket inside perfect for a laptop and another small pocket on the side inside. The straps are padded and comfortable. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: ILoved it so much, I bought one for each of my kids for school!
customer_reviews.text: I have a "fashion conscience" daughter who is very picky. She loved her backpack so much that she bought one for her boyfriend and he loves it too. It's cool enough for college students, is durable and holds lots of books. Highly recommend. There is a color for everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi creason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a backpack for my teddy bear. I event to BAB, but it was too small and not up to par. This was THE PERFECT SIZE I was looking for! Absolutely love it. You can even fit small things for him.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a well made product and I do like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made product and I do like the look of it. The reason I marked a star off is simply because it looks a bit small on my frame while I am wearing it (being a ~6' 1" male), which deters me from wearing it sometimes. Next time I need a bag I will look for a larger one from this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My sons have used these backpacks for years all through middle, high and college.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great college/travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really dig this backpack and that it’s grey which is a nice color. It’s actually kinda big tho, I wish I was a lil bit smaller but other than that, I fit my laptop and notebooks. The small pocket is a lil small too so everything is kinda crowded in there.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality, fit and style as expected. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for over a year. It's a little dirty. Lighter colors are harder to keep clean. That's my fault for getting light grey. It will only fit so much, it will get heavy and hurt my shoulders. Not enough padding under the straps for when it gets heavy. I like that it has a pouch on the inside for your laptop. I've also used this for an overnight trip. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: bbroxx

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery! Perfect backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but I’m surprised, I ordered this Sunday evening when I realized my little brother didn’t have a back and it arrived today, Tuesday morning! I loved how fast the backpack was delivered. Love the material, I can tell this will definitely last a while. Will for sure purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: daya

customer_reviews.title: Ok, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, and love the look of the backpack and the color, but it's so stiff/tight. It's hard to open the zippers, the front pocket especially is hard to get into. The size is great for traveling, but again ease of use is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Herschel Heritage Backpack
product_meta.description: Featuring a timeless diamond shaped accent, the heritage backpack offers a functional design and a fine regard for detail.
feature_bullets: Fully lined with Herschel Supply's signature coated polyester fabric
Interior sleeve pocket can hold up to a 15" laptop.
Additional front compartment with a key clip
Internal media pocket with headphone port for added storage options.
